name: Renegade: ORBITA01 (text edition)
description:
'Before the origin of things, geometry was coeternal with the Divine Mind' Johannes Kepler

ORBITA is a series of 4 perfectly looping hand drawn cell animations that, if combined together, form an audio visual composition. 
Animation & Music: LotteZ

They are released on Tezos and Ethereum and part of the Renegade Series.

Follow me on Twitter: @LotteZ13 https://linktr.ee/LotteZ
